name: Small Fortune
description:
NBC’s brand new hit gameshow Small Fortune is now on your phone. Play the games from the show right now!

Test out your skills in this seriously fun game that puts you into the position of a player in studio.

You’ll need a steady and nerves of steel to complete these addictive, super fun mini games.

You can practice first but you’ll have to judge when to press the button and play for real.

Take on daily challenges to earn gems which you can trade in for lives.

Challenge your friends or see if you can beat the scores of the teams from the show. You might even make it to top of the leaderboard!

Will you hold your nerve when it counts? Find out by playing Small Fortune now!

Key features:

- 28 3D games (5 new games released each week for duration of series)
- Complete 5 games and the end game to move up a level
- Unlock new games as you complete levels
- Practice each game up to 5 times before deciding when to play for real
- Take on daily challenges to earn gems
- Trade gems for lives
- Challenge friends to beat your score
- Leaderboards
- Difficulty increases with each new level
- Over 50 levels to keep you hooked
- Bank bonus points for completing each level
- Personal score saved for you to come back and try and beat anytime
- Share your score on social media
- New games coming soon

Free to download. This app contains paid for features and adverts (can be removed via in-app purchase).
